title: What is a firefighter?
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: Trevor Lunn introduces Brion Jones, Station Officer, M.F.B. who outlines the training and different tasks performed by fireman including rescuing people from fires, extinguishing fires, preventing the spread and property damage caused by fires, road rescue, assisting with chemical incidents, gas leaks and unusual rescues from cliffs, trenches and drains.
